me.alexishaldy.db.connection

Class DBConnectionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.alexishaldy.db.connection.DBConnection
      • me.alexishaldy.db.connection.DBConnectionAdapter

  • public class DBConnectionAdapter
extends DBConnection
    This class implements the methods defined in the DBConnection interface. These methods are implemented for working with a MySQL database. The class is part of the Adapter design pattern.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ronald T. Fernandez
    See Also:
    DBConnection

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      • DBConnectionAdapter

        public DBConnectionAdapter(String host,
                           String port,
                           String user,
                           String pass)
                    throws DBException
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        host - Host where the database service is running
        port - Port where the database service is running
        user - User login used to get connected to the database
        pass - Password used to authenticate the user
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred

    • Method Detail

      • getList

        public Vector<String> getList(String query)
                       throws DBException
        This method allows getting the information contained in a table or as a result of a query. The only constraint for this method is that the result can have one single column (otherwise, only the first column will be retrieved). The method derives from the base class DBConnection
        Specified by:
        getList in class DBConnection
        Parameters:
        query - Query used to get the table with a single column
        Returns:
        result Information retrieved after running the query
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred
        See Also:
        DBConnection

      • getTable

        public Column getTable(String tableName)
                throws DBException
        This method allows retrieving the information contained in a table from the database The method derives from the base class DBConnection
        Specified by:
        getTable in class DBConnection
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table whose information is going to be retrieved return Table content retrieved from the database
        Returns:
        Table content retrieved from the database
        Throws:

        See Also:

      • getSystemDBs

        public Map<String,Boolean> getSystemDBs()
                                 throws DBException
        This method allows retrieving the database names that belong to the database manager. The method derives from the base class DBConnection
        Specified by:
        getSystemDBs in class DBConnection
        Returns:
        A map with the database names as the index and "true" as the value.
        Throws:
        DBException - Throws an exception in case a problem with the DB has occurred
        See Also:
        DBConnection
